data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Miami in the half of Toronto.
In the minute 2, Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
Free kick for Toronto in the half of Miami.
Toronto drives forward and Auro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 5, Rosendo Mendoza awards the away team a throw-in.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Rosendo Mendoza.
Miami are coming forward and Blaise Matuidi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 7, Rosendo Mendoza awards Toronto a goal kick.
Toronto to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
Rosendo Mendoza signals a throw-in for Toronto, close to Miami's area.
In the minute 9, Auro (Toronto) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Hartford a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 11, Free kick Miami.
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rosendo Mendoza signals a free kick to Miami.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Miami in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Miami have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 16, Rosendo Mendoza signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Throw-in for Miami close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Toronto.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Miami at Rentschler Field.
Lewis Morgan for Miami gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hartford.
In the minute 21, Rosendo Mendoza signals a Miami throw-in in Toronto's half.
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
Free kick for Miami in the half of Toronto.
Miami to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Toronto at Rentschler Field.
Miami drive upfield and Gonzalo Higuain gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Toronto defender.
Can Miami capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Toronto's half?
In the minute 29, Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Miami in their own half.
Rosendo Mendoza awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 31, Toronto are caught offside.
Dylan Nealis of Miami gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Miami at Rentschler Field.
Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Hartford a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 36, Toronto have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Rosendo Mendoza signals a Miami throw-in in Toronto's half.
In the minute 37, Throw-in Toronto.
Rosendo Mendoza awards Miami a goal kick.
Throw-in Toronto.
In the minute 39, Miami awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Miami drive forward but Gonzalo Higuain is judged offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Toronto in Hartford.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Miami in the half of Toronto.
Lewis Morgan (Miami) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 42, Rosendo Mendoza signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Goal! Miami have got their heads in front thanks to a Blaise Matuidi strike.
Rosendo Mendoza blows to end the first-half.
Rosendo Mendoza has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Tsubasa Endoh with Patrick Mullins. This is the first substitution made today by Greg Vanney.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Toronto.
Alejandro Pozuelo (Toronto) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Hartford Toronto attack through Patrick Mullins. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 49, Ball goes out of play for a Miami goal kick.
Rosendo Mendoza awards the away team a throw-in.
Miami needs to be cautious. Toronto have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Toronto in their own half.
Rosendo Mendoza signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Miami are pushing forward but Rodolfo Pizarro's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 53, Toronto have a goal kick.
Miami needs to be cautious. Toronto have an attacking throw-in.
Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Miami's half?
In the minute 55, Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Ayo Akinola.
Patrick Mullins instrumental with a fine assist.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Rosendo Mendoza.
In the minute 58, Miami have been awarded a corner by Rosendo Mendoza.
Toronto's Alejandro Pozuelo misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hartford.
In the minute 60, Toronto to take a throw-in in Miami territory.
Ayo Akinola (Toronto) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Miami defenders.
Miami advance rapidly upfield but Rosendo Mendoza blows for offside.
In the minute 63, Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Toronto in Hartford.
Can Toronto capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Miami's half?
In the minute 64, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Blaise Matuidi for Miami who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Rosendo Mendoza signals a Toronto throw-in in Miami's half.
Toronto's Tony Gallacher misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Miami at Rentschler Field.
In Hartford, Toronto push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Blaise Matuidi is booked for the away team.
Miami's Blaise Matuidi is back in action after a slight knock.
Corner awarded to Miami.
In the minute 72, Can Miami get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
In the minute 73, Rosendo Mendoza signals a throw-in for Miami, close to Toronto's area.
Richie Laryea is replacing Auro for the home team.
The home team replace Ralph Priso with Liam Fraser.
Wil Trapp (Miami) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Michael Bradley (Toronto) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Toronto at Rentschler Field.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 80, Gonzalo Higuain (Miami) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
Ball safe as Miami is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Miami's Lewis Morgan breaks free at Rentschler Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 80, Toronto have a goal kick.
Rosendo Mendoza signals a free kick to Toronto.
Ben Sweat for Miami has been booked by Rosendo Mendoza and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 83, Toronto have been awarded a penalty in Hartford...
Alejandro Pozuelo smashes in a penalty at Rentschler Field. The score is now 2-1.
Julian Carranza is on a sub for Christian Makoun for Miami.
In the minute 85, Toronto make their fourth substitution with Jayden Nelson replacing Ayo Akinola.
The away team replace Dylan Nealis with Federico Higuain.
Miami make their third substitution with Matias Pellegrini replacing Ben Sweat.
In the minute 86, Victor Ulloa is replacing Wil Trapp for the away team.
Miami surge into the attack at Rentschler Field but Federico Higuain’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hartford.
In the minute 88, Rosendo Mendoza awards Miami a goal kick.
Omar Gonzalez is on a sub for Nick DeLeon for Toronto.
Goal kick for Miami at Rentschler Field.
In the minute 89, Rosendo Mendoza signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Miami will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Toronto.
Miami awarded a free kick in their own half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Miami.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Rosendo Mendoza.
Corner awarded to Miami.
Throw-in for Miami close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
Miami have a goal kick.
Miami's Alvas Powell gets in a shot on goal at Rentschler Field. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Miami in the half of Toronto.
Miami have been awarded a corner by Rosendo Mendoza.
Miami have a dangerous throw-in.
Miami have a dangerous throw-in.
Toronto needs to be cautious. Miami have an attacking throw-in.
Alvas Powell of Miami smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The match has come to a close in Hartford. The final score is 2-1.
